adDetails: HI, WE OFFER THE HOUSE CLEANING SERVICE IN THE BAY AREA. PLEASE CALL OR TEX ANY TIME show contact info NOHEMI OUR SERVICE INCLUDE BUT NO LIMITED: All cleaning products and equipment are supplied, but can use yours if you prefer Dusting, vacuuming, sweeping, and mopping of entire home Wood floors, marble, granite, All baseboards wiped clean All cob webbs removed All trash out BATHROOMS Entire bathroom cleaned and sanitized, KITCHENS All cabinetry exterior cleaned Sink and counter tops cleaned and sanitized Stove top, microwave cleaned and degrease, Refrigerator exterior cleaned and sanitized Please Call show contact info Ask for NOHEMI.Thank you.
